alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 29 at 3:18AM MST until March 30 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MST /3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST /6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The eastern Mogollon Rim and downwind including portions of the Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM MST/3 PM MDT this afternoon to 5 PM MST/6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
